mods.abstract: In this interview Jessie Perkins describes what the Evergreen neighborhood was like when she moved there in 1911. ï¿½She talks about different social organizations, the Evergreen Civic Club for examample; what she did for fun; and where she did it. She also discusses how the Evergreen community has changed.
